title: I have a trophy wife – and I don't care that she wants me for my money
text:
This is my second marriage and I’m all too aware that I am the ultimate cliché. I’m possibly having a mid-life crisis... and I’ve just married a woman who is only six years older than my daughter.

I try to tell myself that I don’t care what anyone else thinks, that it’s only my new wife’s feelings and mine that matter, but I do care. Really.

My ex-wife and I had a reasonably amicable divorce 11 years ago. We’d led separate lives for years. Well, I say that. What I mean is, we’d stopped having sex. I can’t remember who instigated that, maybe it was me, but without even noticing, we’d ended up in separate bedrooms. It started with me not wanting to disturb her when I came home from work late....
description: This is my second marriage and I’m all too aware that I am the ultimate cliché.
